message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $140.  This product is truly worth it.
I'm still not sure if I can go up to $140. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
